anchorage.title: Anchorage
anchorage.gettingThere: Ted Stevens Anchorage International Airport (ANC). Major hub for Alaska flights.

fairbanks.title: Fairbanks
fairbanks.gettingThere: Fairbanks International Airport (FAI). Alaska Railroad from Anchorage (12 hours).

juneau.title: Juneau
juneau.tagline: Capital city at the edge of wilderness
juneau.gettingThere: Juneau International Airport (JNU). No road access â€” fly or take Alaska Marine Highway ferry.

denali-national-park.title: Denali National Park
denali-national-park.tagline: Home of North America's tallest peak
denali-national-park.gettingThere: Drive 4.5 hours north from Anchorage on Parks Highway or take the Alaska Railroad.

glacier-bay.title: Glacier Bay
glacier-bay.gettingThere: Fly from Juneau to Gustavus (30 min) or take Alaska Marine Highway ferry.

kenai-fjords.title: Kenai Fjords
kenai-fjords.gettingThere: Drive 2.5 hours south from Anchorage to Seward, the park gateway.

sitka.title: Sitka
sitka.tagline: Where Russian and Tlingit heritage meet the sea
sitka.gettingThere: Sitka Rocky Gutierrez Airport (SIT). Alaska Marine Highway ferry from Juneau (8 hours).

ketchikan.title: Ketchikan
ketchikan.gettingThere: Ketchikan International Airport (KTN). First stop for northbound Alaska Marine Highway ferries.

skagway.title: Skagway
skagway.gettingThere: Alaska Marine Highway ferry from Juneau (4.5 hours) or cruise ship. Road access via Klondike Highway from Whitehorse, Yukon.

seward.title: Seward
seward.gettingThere: Drive 2.5 hours south from Anchorage on Seward Highway (one of America's most scenic drives).

homer.title: Homer
homer.gettingThere: Drive 5 hours south from Anchorage or fly via Ravn Alaska.

kodiak.title: Kodiak
kodiak.gettingThere: Fly from Anchorage to Kodiak (1 hour) or take Alaska Marine Highway ferry (10 hours).

valdez.title: Valdez
valdez.gettingThere: Drive 6 hours east from Anchorage via Glenn and Richardson Highways.

wrangell-st-elias.title: Wrangell-St. Elias
wrangell-st-elias.gettingThere: Drive 5 hours from Anchorage to Chitina, then 60 miles on gravel McCarthy Road.

katmai-national-park.title: Katmai National Park
katmai-national-park.gettingThere: Fly to King Salmon (AKN) from Anchorage, then floatplane to Brooks Camp.

nome.title: Nome
nome.tagline: Where the trail meets the sea
nome.gettingThere: Fly from Anchorage to Nome (1.5 hours). No road access from the highway system.

utqiagvik.title: Utqiagvik
utqiagvik.tagline: Life at the top of the world
utqiagvik.gettingThere: Fly from Anchorage or Fairbanks to Utqiagvik (formerly Barrow). No road access.

haines.title: Haines
haines.gettingThere: Alaska Marine Highway ferry from Juneau (4.5 hours) or drive from Haines Junction, Yukon.

talkeetna.title: Talkeetna
talkeetna.tagline: Small town beneath the Great One
talkeetna.gettingThere: Drive 2.5 hours north from Anchorage on Parks Highway or take Alaska Railroad.

whittier.title: Whittier
whittier.gettingThere: Drive 1.5 hours south from Anchorage through Anton Anderson Memorial Tunnel (toll, scheduled).

petersburg.title: Petersburg
petersburg.gettingThere: Fly from Juneau or take Alaska Marine Highway ferry. No large cruise ships dock here.
